```{r}
### SIR model with demography dag
library(ggplot2)

L <- 70

A = seq(2, 50, .01)
R0_est <- L/A +1 
df <- data.frame(A, R0_est)

png('./lecture2/R0vsA.png')

ggplot(data = df, aes(x = A, y = R0_est)) + 
  geom_line(color = 'blue')

dev.off()
```
